Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_set_3D_provider_preference

The function AIL_set_3D_provider_preference sets provider level preferences.

void AIL_set_3D_provider_preference(
  HPROVIDER m3d,
  char const * preference,
  void const * value
);

In Parameters

m3d
indicates the M3D provider handle to set the preference on.
preference
is a string variable describing the preference to set.
value
is a pointer to a variable containing the value to be set.

Discussion

Most providers also publish provider-specific preferences see the provider information at the end of this chapter for details.

See the provider information at the end of this chapter for a list of each provider's preferences.

Example: To set the EAX room style, you could use the following code (you'd usually want to use the AIL_set_3D_room_type function, though): 


U32 room_style=EAX_ENVIRONMENT_BATHROOM;
AIL_set_3D_provider_preference( eax_m3d,
                                "EAX  environment selection",
                                &room_style);


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_provider_attribute, AIL_set_3D_room_type, AIL_set_3D_sample_preference
Related Basic Types: HPROVIDER, char const *, void, void const *
